qas.question: Literary devices are employed for what reason?
What is one form of narration in literature?
What are two types of narrative structure in literature?

answers.text: linear narrative or a nonlinear narrative

qas.question: Why would an author utilize experimental narratives in literature?
In what type of writing would a more familiar, standard literary narrative structure be employed?
Literary techniques are used to disenhance the what of a piece of literature?

plausible_answers.text: crafting a work: whether a work is narrated in first-person or from another perspective

qas.question: Literary techniques cover a slim range of what?

plausible_answers.text: first-person or from another perspective, whether to use a traditional linear narrative or a nonlinear nar

qas.question: What are examples of poetic technique?

plausible_answers.text: choose to experiment with their technique

qas.question: What might the author do to bore the reader?

plausible_answers.text: enhance the written framework of a piece of literature, and produce specific effects

qas.question: What do literary techniques specifically accomplish?
Why do all authors experiment with their technique?
What is a familiar structure is an example of?

context: A literary technique or literary device can be used by authors in order to <b9_0>enhance the <b5_0>written framework<b5_0/> of a piece of literature, and <a0_0>produce specific effects<b9_0/><a0_0/>. Literary techniques encompass a wide range of approaches to <b6_0>crafting a work: whether a work is narrated in <a1_0><b7_0>first-person<a1_0/> or from another perspective<b6_0/>, whether to use a traditional <a2_0>linear narrative or a nonlinear nar<b7_0/>rative<a2_0/>, or the choice of literary genre, are all examples of <b11_0>literary technique<b11_0/>. They may indicate to a reader that there is a familiar structure and presentation to a work, such as <a4_0>a conventional murder-mystery novel<a4_0/>; or, the author may <b8_0>choose to experiment with their technique<b8_0/> <a3_0><b10_0>to surprise the reader<b10_0/><a3_0/>.
